product_name: Klean Kanteen Insulated Pint Cup - 16 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep your favorite beverage cold to the last drop or steaming hot with the 16 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Insulated Pint cup. Double-wall design provides insulation to keep your beer, soda or water cold and your coffee or tea hot. Cup is made of tough 18/8 food-grade stainless steel that is BPA free; steel won't retain or impart flavors. Laser-etched Klean Kanteen logo won't wear off. Hand wash only.
short_description: Keep your favorite beverage cold to the last drop or steaming hot with the 16 fl. oz. Klean Kanteen Insulated Pint cup.
